:arrow.description: Whether or not to display an arrow, including the configuration that points to the center of the element
:arrow.description_zh: 是否显示箭头，包含是否指向元素中心的配置

:gap.description: Control the rounded borders and display spacing of highlighted areas
:gap.description_zh: 控制高亮区域的圆角边框和显示间距

placement.description: The position of the bootstrap card relative to the target element
placement.type: center / left / leftTop / leftBottom / right / rightTop / rightBottom / top / topLeft / topRight / bottom / bottomLeft / bottomRight
placement.description_zh: 引导卡片相对于目标元素的位置

:mask.description: Whether or not to enable the mask, you can also pass in the configuration to change the mask style and fill color
:mask.description_zh: 是否启用蒙层，也可传入配置改变蒙层样式和填充色

type.description: Type, which affects the base color and text color
type.description_zh: 类型，影响底色与文字颜色

:current.description: What step is it currently at

:scrollIntoViewOptions.description: Whether to support the current element to scroll into the window, you can also specify the relevant parameters of the scrolling window
:scrollIntoViewOptions.description_zh: 是否支持当前元素滚动到视窗内，也可传入配置指定滚动视窗的相关参数

:getPopupContainer.description: Set the rendering node of the Tour floating layer, the default is body
:getPopupContainer.description_zh: 设置 Tour 浮层的渲染节点，默认是 body

rootClassName.description: className added to the outermost layer of the component
rootClassName.description_zh: 添加在组件最外层的 className

events.name: onClose
events.description: The callback function when tour is turned off
events.description_zh: 关闭引导时的回调函数

events.name: onFinish
events.description: A callback when the tour is complete

events.name: onChange
events.description: The callback when the step is changed, current is the current step
events.description_zh: 步骤改变时的回调，current 为当前的步骤

TourStep.name: target
TourStep.description: Get the element that the guide card points to, center on the screen when empty
TourStep.description_zh: 获取引导卡片指向的元素，为空时居中于屏幕

TourStep.name: arrow
TourStep.description: Whether or not to display an arrow, including the configuration that points to the center of the element
TourStep.description_zh: 是否显示箭头，包含是否指向元素中心的配置

TourStep.name: placement
TourStep.description: The position of the guide card relative to the target element
TourStep.description_zh: 引导卡片相对于目标元素的位置
TourStep.type: center | left | leftTop | leftBottom | right | rightTop | rightBottom | top | topLeft | topRight | bottom | bottomLeft | bottomRight

TourStep.name: onClose
TourStep.description: The callback function when tour is turned off
TourStep.description_zh: 关闭引导时的回调函数

TourStep.name: mask
TourStep.description: Whether or not to enable the mask, you can also pass in the configuration to change the mask style and fill color, by default follows the Tour's mask property
TourStep.description_zh: 是否启用蒙层，也可传入配置改变蒙层样式和填充色，默认跟随 Tour 的 mask 属性

TourStep.name: type
TourStep.description: Type, which affects the base color and text color
TourStep.description_zh: 类型，影响底色与文字颜色

TourStep.name: scrollIntoViewOptions
TourStep.description: Whether to support the current element to scroll into the window, you can also specify the relevant parameters of the scrolling window, by default follows the Tour's scrollIntoViewOptions property
TourStep.description_zh: 是否支持当前元素滚动到视窗内，也可传入配置指定滚动视窗的相关参数，默认跟随 Tour 的 scrollIntoViewOptions 属性
